scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:production && npm run clean:editor && npm run clean:patterns && npm run clean:parts && npm run clean:templates
scripts.parse:pages: html2pattern convert src/pages -o patterns --namespace=$(basename $(pwd)) --categories=pages --viewport-width=1600 --description='Page template patterns'
scripts.parse:patterns: html2pattern convert src/patterns -o patterns --namespace=$(basename $(pwd)) --categories=patterns,sections --viewport-width=1280 --description='Reusable pattern sections'
scripts.parse:parts: for file in src/parts/*.html; do [ -f "$file" ] && node -e "const {html2blocks,generateBlockMarkup}=require('./includes/CLI/html2pattern-cli/src/parser.js');const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const input=process.argv[1];const html=fs.readFileSync(input,'utf8');const blocks=html2blocks(html);const markup=generateBlockMarkup(blocks);const output='parts/'+path.basename(input);fs.writeFileSync(output,markup,'utf8');console.log('✓ Converted',path.basename(input));" "$file"; done
scripts.parse:all: npm run parse:pages && npm run parse:patterns
scripts.parts:pull: THEME=$(basename $(pwd)) && cd ../../.. && wp blocks:html parts --all && cd wp-content/themes/$THEME
scripts.parts:push: THEME=$(basename $(pwd)) && cd ../../.. && wp html:blocks src/parts --all && cd wp-content/themes/$THEME
scripts.page:pull: cd ../../.. && wp page pull --all && cd wp-content/themes/blank-theme && npx prettier --write "src/content/pages/**/*.html"
scripts.template:pull: for file in templates/*.html; do [ -f "$file" ] && cd ../../.. && wp template pull $(basename "$file" .html) && cd wp-content/themes/blank-theme; done
scripts.template:push: for file in src/templates/*.html; do [ -f "$file" ] && cd ../../.. && wp template push $(basename "$file" .html) && cd wp-content/themes/blank-theme; done
scripts.template:download: for file in templates/*.html; do [ -f "$file" ] && cd ../../.. && wp template pull $(basename "$file" .html) && cd wp-content/themes/blank-theme && echo "✓ Pulled $(basename "$file")"; done
scripts.parts:download: cd ../../.. && for name in $(wp post list --post_type=wp_template_part --field=post_name); do wp post get $(wp post list --post_type=wp_template_part --name=$name --field=ID) --field=post_content > wp-content/themes/blank-theme/src/parts/$name.html && echo "✓ Pulled $name.html"; done && cd wp-content/themes/blank-theme

name: umbral
description: Custom WordPress theme for Umbral AI - bringing AI-powered MVPs to life
author: Daniel Snell <daniel@broke.dev>
